Title: The Reverse Midas Touch
Writer: Jenji Kohan (created by), Rebecca Angelo, Lauren Schuker Blum, Molly Smith Metzler (executive story editor), Rebecca Angelo (staff writer), Lauren Schuker Blum (staff writer), Anthony Natoli (staff writer)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Natasha Lyonne, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks
Plot: Taystee tries to keep the negotiations on track. Angie comes up with an idea for fixing Leanne's finger. Piscatella's past is revealed.
